tool.name: lordectrim
tool.description: is an efficient tool to trim weak regions of PacBio corrected reads

param.name: split
param.label: use the split option
param.help: trim all weak regions and split the reads on inner weak regions

tool.help:
**Description** Program for correcting sequencing errors in PacBio reads using highly accurate short reads (e.g. Illumina).
LoRDEC outputs the corrected reads to the given file in FASTA format. The regions that remain weak after the correction are outputted in lower case characters and the solid regions are outputted in upper case characters.
